name: HashType
description: enumerated data type defines additional specifications of the of the algorithm used to compute the checksum.

name: SignatureMethod
description: enumerated data type defines additional specifications of the of the signature method used to sign the document.

name: ArtifactType
description: enumerated data type defines additional specifications of the of the type of artifact.

name: PopulationMethod
description: enumerated data type defines additional specifications of the way the SBOM document was created.

name: RelationshipType
description: enumerated data type defines additional specifications of the nature of the relation between the SBOM documents.

name: FileType
description: enumerated data type defines additional specifications of the the nature of the file.

name: AnnotationType
description: enumerated data type defines additional specifications of the of the nature of the annotation content.

name: LicenseInformationType
description: enumerated data type defines additional specifications of the type of the license information.

name: CreationType
description: enumerated data type defines additional specifications of the type of the build activity.

name: AssessmentType
description: enumerated data type defines additional specifications of the type of the assessment activity.
